column4: The sound on my system is too weak, and I can't seem to find any player for Linux that includes an equalizer... anyone know of anything?
I set the volume control to the maximum setting but the volume is still too weak, and I know it can get much better because it was when I had XP on this computer.
It's my only problem so far, so if you can solve it i'll be set
what sound hardware are you using?
it's probably a driver issue if you've tried all the sliders in the mixer.. sometimes you can set parameters for the driver
try googling for the sound chip name and model..see if anyone has similar problems.. make a bug report if you can't find a solution
